T16D4421-2:1b-1: gang zhig sdig pa can gyi skye bo slu bar

T16D4421-2:17a-0: @17a * // chos gzhan ni rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid can no //

T16D4421-2:17a-4: de kho na la zhes bya ba ni sbyor bar byed pa po'i sems la'o //
T16D4421-2:17a-5: de'i rgyu can gyis zhes bya ba ni yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyu can no //

T16D4421-2:17a-8: yongs su dga' bar 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni /

T16D4421-2:17a-15: so // rnam par rig byed med pa'i phyir ro
T16D4421-2:17a-16: zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa la

T16D4421-2:24a-28: sdug bsngal thams cad 'jug pa'i bdag nyid kyis zhes bya ba la /
T16D4421-2:24a-29: sdug bsngal thams cad ni nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'o /
T16D4421-2:24a-30: de 'jug pa'i bdag nyid ni 'khor ba ste mchog tu mi bde ba'o //
T16D4421-2:24a-31: mi bde ba'i don dang mi dge ba'i don gyis 'khor ba ni don dam par mi dge ba'o //
T16D4421-2:24a-32: rnam pa gcig tu na skye ba la sogs pa'i
T16D4421-2:24a-33: sdug bsngal thams cad kyi gzhir gyur pa thams cad
T16D4421-2:24a-35: sdug bsngal thams cad ni sdug bsngal gsum yin la
T16D4421-2:24a-36: 'khor ba yang de dag 'jug pa'i bdag nyid do
T16D4421-2:24a-37: // nad dang mi 'phrod pa'i sman la sogs pa dper bya'o zhes bya ba la /
T16D4421-2:24a-38: 'khor ba ni mchog tu mi dge ba yin pas nad kyi dper brjod par bya'o //
T16D4421-2:24b-0: chags pa la @24b sogs pa dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis mi dge ba yin te /
T16D4421-2:24b-1: de'i phyir chags pa la sogs pa dag ni ma 'phrod pa'i sman gyi dper brjod par bya'o //
T16D4421-2:24b-2: chags pa la sogs pa de dag dang mtshungs par
T16D4421-2:24b-3: ldan pa de dag gi ngo bo ma yin pas
T16D4421-2:24b-4: mtshungs par ldan pa dag ni mi 'phrod pa'i sman
T16D4421-2:24b-5: dang sbyar ba'i btung bas dper brjod par bya'o //
T16D4421-2:24b-6: lus dang ngag gi las dang skye ba la sogs
T16D4421-2:24b-7: pa de dag gis kun nas bslang ba rnams ni
T16D4421-2:24b-8: kun nas bslang ba mi dge ba yin gyi ngo
T16D4421-2:24b-9: bo dang mtshungs par ldan pas ma yin pas mi
T16D4421-2:24b-10: 'phrod pa'i sman dang sbyar ba'i btung ba las byung
T16D4421-2:24b-11: ba'i 'o mas dper brjod par bya'o //
T16D4421-2:24b-12: de lta na 'o na ni zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
T16D4421-2:24b-13: 'khor ba don dam par mi dge ba yin la /
T16D4421-2:24b-14: 'khor ba'i khungs su gtogs pa'i phyir zag pa dang
T16D4421-2:24b-15: bcas pa'i dngos po thams cad cung zad kyang lung
T16D4421-2:24b-16: du bstan pa'am dge bar mi 'gyur la ;
T16D4421-2:24b-17: zag pa med pa'i kho na lung du ma bstan
T16D4421-2:24b-18: pa 'am dge par thal bar 'gyur ro zhe na
T16D4421-2:24b-19: / don dam par de de skad du bshad kyi
T16D4421-2:24b-20: dgongs pa ni mtshan nyid kyi zag pa dang bcas
T16D4421-2:24b-21: pa dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du
T16D4421-2:24b-22: ma bstan pa nyid yin no //
T16D4421-2:24b-23: rnam par smin pa yid du 'ong ba can ni dge ba'o //
T16D4421-2:24b-24: yid du mi 'ong ba can ni mi dge ba'o //
T16D4421-2:24b-25: rnam par smin pa med pa ni lung du ma bstan pa ste /
T16D4421-2:24b-26: rnam par smin pa bde ba dang bde ba can ma yin pa'i phyir dang /
T16D4421-2:24b-27: rnam par smin pa'i phyir brda mi 'phrod pa'i phyir lung du ma bstan pa'o //
T16D4421-2:24b-28: don dam par lung ma bstan pa brten pa dag zhes bya ba ni /
T16D4421-2:24b-29: rnam grangs med par lung du ma bstan pa dag yin te /
T16D4421-2:24b-30: dge ba dang mi dge ba'i mtshan nyid bzhi dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
T16D4421-2:24b-31: ci ste 'byung ba chen po rnams zhes bya ba
T16D4421-2:24b-32: ni dge ba dang mi dge ba nyid ma yin
T16D4421-2:24b-33: te / las kyi rten 'byung ba rnams kyang sems
T16D4421-2:24b-34: gcig gis kun nas bslang ba'i phyir las bzhin du
T16D4421-2:24b-35: dge ba dang mi dge ba nyid du 'gyur ro
T16D4421-2:24b-37: byed pa po ni las la sems pa yin gyi
T16D4421-2:24b-38: 'byung ba rnams la ni ma yin no zhes bya
T16D4421-2:25a-0: ba 'byung ste / 'ga' yang 'byung ba rnams bya'o snyam @25a * //
T16D4421-2:25a-2: dge ba dang mi dge ba'i sems mngon du byed pa ma yin gyi 'o na ci zhe na /
T16D4421-2:25a-3: lus dang ngag gi rnam par rig byed kun nas bslang bar bya'o snyam du'o //
T16D4421-2:25a-4: gal te bsam pa'i dbang gis dge ba dang mi
T16D4421-2:25a-5: dge ba'i nyid yin gyi kun nas bslang ba tsam
T16D4421-2:25a-6: gis ma yin na mnyam par gzhag pa'i zhes bya
T16D4421-2:25a-8: mnyam par gzhag pa ni 'di snyam du rnam par
T16D4421-2:25a-9: rig byed ma yin pa bya'o snyam du mi sems
T16D4421-2:25a-11: nyon mongs pas nyes par spyad pa'i gnyen po'i dbang
T16D4421-2:25a-12: gis bsam gtan zag pa med pa'i sdom pa dag
T16D4421-2:25a-13: kyang yod par bsam mo zhe na /
T16D4421-2:25a-14: nyon mongs pas nyes par spyad pa'i gnyen po bsam
T16D4421-2:25a-15: gtan dang zag pa med pa'i sdom pa dag yod
T16D4421-2:25a-16: mod kyi de dag kun nas bslang ba las de'i
T16D4421-2:25a-17: gnyen por bsam pa ma yin te /
T16D4421-2:25a-18: de'i phyir 'di dag kha cig gis rtogs pa ma yin no //
T16D4421-2:25a-19: mnyam par gzhag pa la rnam pa rig byed ma yin pa med par bsam mo zhes so //
T16D4421-2:25a-20: mnyam par gzhag pa'i gnas skabs na bsam pa yod do zhe na /
T16D4421-2:25a-21: de'i phyir mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te //
T16D4421-2:25a-22: sa 'og ma'i sbyor ba'i sems de ni sa gong
T16D4421-2:25a-23: ma'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa kun nas
T16D4421-2:25a-24: slong bar byed pa yin pa mi rung ngo //
T16D4421-2:25a-25: gal te sbyor ba'i sems kyi dbang gis rnam par
T16D4421-2:25a-26: rig byed ma yin pa dge ba nyid du 'dod
T16D4421-2:25a-27: na ni / rang gi sa pa'i ting nge 'dzin
T16D4421-2:25a-28: nyon mongs can gyis gzir ba sa 'og ma las
T16D4421-2:25a-29: nem nur du 'gyur te sbyor ba mi dge ba'i
T16D4421-2:25a-30: sems su gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T16D4421-2:25a-31: de lta na lha'i mig dang rna ba dag zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ste /
T16D4421-2:25a-32: sbyor ba'i dus na de dag sems pa yod pas so //
T16D4421-2:25a-33: 'di la 'bad par bya dgos so zhes bya ba ni /
T16D4421-2:25a-34: 'dir nyes pa 'dir thal bar 'gyur ba bden mod
T16D4421-2:25a-35: kyi 'di la lan gyi phyir 'bad par bya dgos
T16D4421-2:25a-36: so // gzhan dag ni lan du lus dang ngag
T16D4421-2:25a-37: gi las dag ni nam yang sems med par mthong
T16D4421-2:25a-38: so // ste / de'i phyir de ni sems kyi
T16D4421-2:25b-0: dbang gis dge ba la sogs @25b pa'i ngo bor
T16D4421-2:25b-1: 'byung ba rnams ni sems la ltos te 'byung ba
T16D4421-2:25b-2: ma yin te de rnams ni sems med kyang 'byung
T16D4421-2:25b-3: so // ste / ba'i phyir ro / de'i phyir
T16D4421-2:25b-4: de rnams ni mig la sogs pa bzhin du sems
T16D4421-2:25b-5: kyi dbang gis dge ba la sogs par mi dbye'o
T16D4421-2:25b-6: so // ste / ba'i phyir ro / zhes smra
T16D4421-2:25b-7: ste // de lta na ni 'o na skye ba
T16D4421-2:25b-9: thob pa la sogs pa rnams kyang kun nas bslang
T16D4421-2:25b-10: bas dge ba nyid du mi 'gyur te de dag
T16D4421-2:25b-11: gi don du mi 'jug pa'i phyir dang /
T16D4421-2:25b-12: sems med pa rnams la yang 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T16D4421-2:25b-13: 'di la lan ni skye ba la sogs pa dang
T16D4421-2:25b-14: thob pa la sogs pa rnams ni bdag nyid kyis
T16D4421-2:25b-15: dge ba la sogs pa nyid ma yin gyi /
T16D4421-2:25b-17: chos kyi dbang gis dge ba la sogs par rnam par gzhag la /
T16D4421-2:25b-18: de dag gi 'byung ba chen po rnams bzhin kha
T16D4421-2:25b-19: cig tu bltos pas bdag nyid pas grub pa yod
T16D4421-2:25b-20: do // sems gzhan gyi dbang gis chos skye ba
T16D4421-2:25b-21: la sogs pa rnams kyang dge ba la sogs pa
T16D4421-2:25b-22: do // nyid du skye'o // de bzhin du skye
T16D4421-2:25b-23: pa'i sems med par rgyun tu zhugs par ma mthong
T16D4421-2:25b-24: ba'i phyir sems snga ma'i 'phen pa nyid las de
T16D4421-2:25b-25: do // nyid du skye'o // 'jug go // de
T16D4421-2:25b-26: ltar na lha'i mig dang rna ba dag kyang dge
T16D4421-2:25b-28: rnam par grol ba'i lam dang lhan cig skye ba'i phyir dang /
T16D4421-2:25b-29: de yang lung du ma bstan pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T16D4421-2:25b-30: log par lta ba de las ni zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
T16D4421-2:25b-31: log par lta ba mthong bas spang bar bya ba
T16D4421-2:25b-32: ni log pa'i ngag gi las kyi mtha' gnyis kyis
T16D4421-2:25b-33: kun nas bslang ba nyid du gsungs pas bsgom pas
T16D4421-2:25b-34: spang par bya ba kho na rnam par rig byed
T16D4421-2:25b-35: kun nas bslang gi mthong bas spang bar bya bas
T16D4421-2:25b-36: ni ma yin no zhes gang bshad pa de ni
T16D4421-2:25b-38: 'dis kun nas bslang bas kun nas bslang ba'o //
T16D4421-2:25b-39: de'i mtshan nyid kun nas bslang bas khyad par gyi don du rgyu smas la /
T16D4421-2:25b-40: de nyid bya ba'i dus te de'i dus ni de'i dus kyi kun slong ngo /
T16D4421-2:25b-41: de nyid kyi phyir de'i dus kho nar de yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos so //
T16D4421-2:25b-42: 'phen par byed pa yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni skyed par byed pa yin pa'i phyir te /
T16D4421-2:26a-0: rgyun mtha' dag skyed pa'i rgyu nyid @26a * //
T16D4421-2:26a-2: bya ba'i dus su mthun par 'jug pa'i phyir zhes
T16D4421-2:26a-3: bya ba ni skad cig re re zhing skye ba'i
T16D4421-2:26a-4: dus su de la phan 'dogs pa'i phyir ro //
T16D4421-2:26a-5: gal te de'i dus kun nas slong ba skyed par byed pa ma yin na ni /
T16D4421-2:26a-6: de ni rnam par rig byed kyi bya ba de
T16D4421-2:26a-7: la da'i dus su kun nas bslang de'i nus pa
T16D4421-2:26a-8: ci zhig yod / 'o na sems med pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T16D4421-2:26a-9: bsnyen par rdzogs par 'dod pas dge slong gi dge
T16D4421-2:26a-10: 'dun la gsol ba btab nas 'gog pa la snyoms
T16D4421-2:26a-11: par zhugs pa'i lus kyi rnam par rig byed sdom
T16D4421-2:26a-12: pa'i nang du 'dus pa de sdom pa skye ba'i
T16D4421-2:26a-13: dus su de la dus kyi kun slong med par
T16D4421-2:26a-14: ji ltar skye zhe na zhes bya ba'o //
T16D4421-2:26a-15: mthong bas spang bya'i rnam shes ni zhes bya ba
T16D4421-2:26a-16: ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba ni rab tu
T16D4421-2:26a-17: 'jug par byed pa kho na yin gyi /
T16D4421-2:26a-18: mthong bas spang bar bya ba kho na rab tu 'jug par byed pa ni ma yin no //
T16D4421-2:26a-19: ji ltar rab tu 'jug par byed pa yin zhe na /
T16D4421-2:26a-20: de'i phyir de kun nas slong bar byed pa zhes bya ba rgyas par smos te /
T16D4421-2:26a-21: mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i sems lus dang ngag
T16D4421-2:26a-22: gis kun nas slong bar byed pa rtog pa dang
T16D4421-2:26a-23: dpyod pa dag gi gzhir gyur pa'i phyir kun nas
T16D4421-2:26a-24: bslang ba zhes bya ba ste dngos su ni ma
T16D4421-2:26a-26: bya ba'i dus na med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni /
T16D4421-2:26a-27: mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i rab tu 'jug byed med pa'i phyir ro //
T16D4421-2:26a-28: 'dir yang bya ba gcig dang du ma la spyod pa'i sems srid de /
T16D4421-2:26a-29: bya ba gcig dang lhan cig nyid de gzhan du na bya ba skad cig ma'o //
T16D4421-2:26a-30: des kun nas bslang ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs
T16D4421-2:26a-31: pa ni de'i dus kyi kun nas bslang ba'i dbang
T16D4421-2:26a-32: du byas nas brjod pa yin gyi /
T16D4421-2:26a-33: rgyu'i kun nas bslang ba ni ma yin no //
T16D4421-2:26a-35: gal te mthong bas spang bar bya ba de yang
T16D4421-2:26a-36: rjes su 'jug par byed pa yin na ni de'i
T16D4421-2:26a-37: phyir mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i rjes su 'jug
T16D4421-2:26a-38: pa des kun nas bslang ba'i lus dang ngag gi
T16D4421-2:26a-39: rnam par rig byed kyi gzugs gang yin pa de
T16D4421-2:26a-40: yang mthong bas spang bar bya ba yin par 'gyur
T16D4421-2:26a-41: na / 'dod pa na yang ma yin te /
T16D4421-2:26b-0: de'i phyir mthong bas spang bar bya ba @26b rjes su 'jug pa med do //
T16D4421-2:26b-1: cir 'gyur zhes bya ba ni gal te gzugs mthong
T16D4421-2:26b-2: bas spang bar bya bar 'gyur na skyon cir 'gyur
T16D4421-2:26b-3: / chos mngon pa la gnod par 'gyur te /
T16D4421-2:26b-5: nyon mongs can min mthong spang min //
T16D4421-2:26b-6: gzugs min drug pa min skyes min //
T16D4421-2:26b-9: gzugs ni rig pa dang ma rig pa dag dang mi 'gal ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
T16D4421-2:26b-11: gzugs ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba ma yin no //
T16D4421-2:26b-12: 'di ltar gzugs ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i
T16D4421-2:26b-13: nyon mongs pa ltar rig pa mthong ba'i lam dang
T16D4421-2:26b-14: mi 'gal te / bden pa mthong ba rnams kyang de dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T16D4421-2:26b-15: de'i phyir mthong bas spang bar bya ba ma yin no //
T16D4421-2:26b-16: de kun 'byung ba'i gnas skabs na zag pa med
T16D4421-2:26b-17: pa'i lam ltar ma rig pa mi 'byung ba ni
T16D4421-2:26b-18: ma yin te / de'i phyir ma rig pa dang yang mi 'gal lo //
T16D4421-2:26b-19: tshig lhag mar byas te lhag ma las rnam par
T16D4421-2:26b-20: rig byed kyi gzugs bsgom pas spang bar bya ba
T16D4421-2:26b-21: yin no zhes bya bar ro //
T16D4421-2:26b-22: phyogs 'di bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'o //
T16D4421-2:26b-23: gzugs rig pa dang mi 'gal lo zhes bya ba ste /
T16D4421-2:26b-24: gang zhig gzugs mthong bas spang bar bya ba 'dod
T16D4421-2:26b-25: pa de de ji ltar rig pa dang 'gal bar
T16D4421-2:26b-27: yang na nyon mongs pa can gyi chos kyi thob
T16D4421-2:26b-28: pa ltar mi 'gal yang rnam par rig byed kyi
T16D4421-2:26b-29: gzugs dang rig pa ni mthong bas spang bar bya
T16D4421-2:26b-30: ba nyid do // 'di ltar bden pa mthong ba
T16D4421-2:26b-31: la ngan song ba'i lus dang ngag gi las kun
T16D4421-2:26b-33: de'i phyir gzugs ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba
T16D4421-2:26b-34: yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba bsgrub par
T16D4421-2:26b-36: ha cang thal bar 'gyur bas gzhan gyi phyogs bsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
T16D4421-2:26b-37: 'byung ba rnams kyang zhes bya ba rgyas par smos so //
T16D4421-2:26b-38: de nyid la rgyu smos pa ni sems mtshungs pas bslang ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'o //
T16D4421-2:26b-39: mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i sems gang gis gzugs
T16D4421-2:26b-40: de bslang ba de nyid kyis de'i rten 'byung ba
T16D4421-2:26b-41: rnams kyang bslang ba yin no //
T16D4421-2:27a-0: de ltar na mi 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni ji ltar @27a * //
T16D4421-2:27a-1: dge ba dang mi dge ba'i sems kyis kun nas
T16D4421-2:27a-2: bslang ba'i gzugs kho na dge ba dang mi dge
T16D4421-2:27a-3: ba yin gyi de'i rten 'byung ba rnams ni ma
T16D4421-2:27a-4: yin no // yang na gzugs ltar 'byung ba rnams kyang mthong bas spang bar bya bar 'gyur mod /
T16D4421-2:27a-5: kho bo cag la ci gnod ;
T16D4421-2:27a-6: nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i chos zhes bya
T16D4421-2:27a-7: ba ni ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa
T16D4421-2:27a-8: dang dge ba zag pa dang bcas pa'o //
T16D4421-2:27a-9: rig pa dang ma rig pa dag dang mi 'gal ba'i phyir zhes bya ba la ni /
T16D4421-2:27a-10: thob pa gcod pa'i 'gal ba'i sgo nas ni rig
T16D4421-2:27a-11: pa mthong ba'i lam dang 'gal bar 'gyur ba zhig
T16D4421-2:27a-12: ste / dper na mthong bas spang bar bya'i nyon
T16D4421-2:27a-13: mongs pa rnams thob pa chad pa'i phyir 'gal ba
T16D4421-2:27a-14: ste / bzhin no // lam bzhin du ma rig
T16D4421-2:27a-15: pa dang 'gal ba yang ma yin zhing 'byung ba
T16D4421-2:27a-16: chen po rnams ni ma bsgribs la lung du ma
T16D4421-2:27a-18: de rnams kyang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba kho na yin no //
T16D4421-2:27a-19: de'i phyir de ltar rgol ba bkod de mthong bas
T16D4421-2:27a-20: spang bar bya ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rab
T16D4421-2:27a-21: tu 'jug par byed pa kho na yin no zhes
T16D4421-2:27a-22: lan rab tu bzhag nas 'jug par byed pa ni
T16D4421-2:27a-23: de lta bas na mdo las rgyu'i kun nas bslang
T16D4421-2:27a-24: ba'i dbang du mdzad nas zhes bya ba rgyas par
T16D4421-2:27a-25: 'byung ste / log par lta ba de las ni log par rtog pa dang /
T16D4421-2:27a-27: log pa'i las kyi mtha' 'byung bar 'gyur zhes gsungs pa de dang 'gal ba med do //
T16D4421-2:27a-28: rab tu 'jug byed kyi dbang las dge ba la sogs pa nyid pra tri pa de tya /
T16D4421-2:27a-29: mthong bas spang bar bya ba nyid ces aa bhi su lugs gzhan gyi rgol ba'i tshig go //
T16D4421-2:27a-30: de 'dir rab tu 'jug byed kyi dbang la sogs
T16D4421-2:27a-31: pa nyid du mi 'gal lo zhes khas len par
T16D4421-2:27a-32: byed de / gzugs ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba nyid du 'gal lo //
T16D4421-2:27a-34: (so sor rtog pas) 'gal ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i ni khas len par mi byed pa'o //
T16D4421-2:27a-35: mthong bas spang bar bya ba rab tu 'jug byed de //
T16D4421-2:27a-36: bsgom pas spang bas bar chod pa yod pa ma yin no //
T16D4421-2:27a-37: mthong ba'i lam gyis 'ga' zhig la chags pa dang
T16D4421-2:27a-38: bral ba ma yin pas ci ltar de gnyi ga
T16D4421-2:27b-0: yang spang bya'i ngo bor brjod @27b par byed /
T16D4421-2:27b-1: yid ni zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa las rnam par gcod pa'o //
T16D4421-2:27b-2: bsgom pas spang bar bya ba ni /

T16D4421-2:40a-36: pa'i chos rnams skyabs nyid du ma bzhag ce na
T16D4421-2:40a-37: / bye brag tu smra ba rnams re /
T16D4421-2:40b-0: 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa las skyob mi @40b nus pa'i phyir te /
T16D4421-2:40b-1: rang sangs rgyas rnams ni rjes su bstan pa la nus pa yod pa ma yin la /
T16D4421-2:40b-2: byang chub sems dpa' slob pa ni lus mi ldang ba'i phyir ma yin na zhes zer ro //
T16D4421-2:40b-3: shin tu smad phyir zhes bya ba la /
T16D4421-2:40b-4: gzhan dag gi chung ma sun 'byin pa'i phyir 'jig rten pa dag gis smad pa yin la /
T16D4421-2:40b-5: ngan song ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir yongs su dpyad pa po dag gis smad pa'o //
T16D4421-2:40b-6: mi tshangs par spyad pa ni /
T16D4421-2:40b-7: de ltar 'jig rten pa dang yongs su rtogs pa
T16D4421-2:40b-8: po dag gis shin tu smad pa ma yin no
T16D4421-2:40b-9: // mi tshangs par spyod pa las ni dka' ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni /
T16D4421-2:40b-10: sngon goms pa'i dbang gis te por nyon mongs kun tu spyod pa'i phyir dang /
T16D4421-2:40b-11: nyes par spyod pa dang mthun pa'i rkyen nye ba'i phyir ro //
T16D4421-2:40b-12: 'dod pas log par g-yem par mi byed pa'i sdom pa 'thob kyi zhes bshad na /
T16D4421-2:40b-13: de ni mi shes so zhe na /
T16D4421-2:40b-14: mi byed par nges pa ni mi byed pa'i sdom pa'o zhes bya ba smos te /
T16D4421-2:40b-15: mi byed pa'i phyir sdom pa ni mi byed pa'i nges pa ste /
T16D4421-2:40b-16: mi byed pa'i phyir nges shing gcig tu nges pa gang yin pa ste /
T16D4421-2:40b-17: de ni mdo sde pa'i tshul du mi byed pa'i sdom pa yin no //
T16D4421-2:40b-18: bye brag tu smra ba rnams kya ltar na ni
T16D4421-2:40b-19: tshul khrims kyi yan lag rnam par rig byed ma
T16D4421-2:40b-21: chung ma len par byed na zhes bya ba la /
T16D4421-2:40b-22: sdom pa ni sems can thams cad las yin pa
T16D4421-2:40b-23: de'i phyir rang gi chung ma las kyang yan lag
T16D4421-2:40b-24: ma yin pa'i rnam par rig byed la sogs pa
T16D4421-2:40b-25: 'thob po / chung mar gyur pa la zhes bya ba ni /
T16D4421-2:40b-26: de'i tshe gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba med pa'i
T16D4421-2:40b-27: phyir thob par gyur pa'i rdzas longs spyod pa ltar
T16D4421-2:40b-28: sdom pa nyams pa med do //
T16D4421-2:40b-29: brdzun smra shin tu smad phyir dang //
T16D4421-2:40b-30: zhes bya ba ni gzhan slu ba'i phyir dang ngan
T16D4421-2:40b-31: song gi rgyu yin pa'i phyir 'jig rten pa dang
T16D4421-2:40b-32: yongs su spyod pa po dag gis phra ma la
T16D4421-2:40b-33: sogs pa dag pas brdzun du smras ba shin tu
T16D4421-2:40b-35: khyim na gnas pas sems can log par bsgrub pa
T16D4421-2:40b-36: rnams la phra ma la sogs pa spong ba dka'i
T16D4421-2:40b-37: brdzun du smra ba la sogs pa spong ba ni
T16D4421-2:41a-1: phyir ro zhes bya ba la chang 'thungs nas srog
T16D4421-2:41a-2: gcod pa la sogs pa dag la yang 'jug par
T16D4421-2:41a-3: 'gyur te / gang gi phyir dran pa dang shes
T16D4421-2:41a-4: bzhin 'joms par byed pa'i phyir rang bzhin gyi kha
T16D4421-2:41a-5: na ma tho ba rnams kyi yang rgyur 'gyur ba
T16D4421-2:41a-6: 'gyur te / yin no // gnyen po'i blo kho
T16D4421-2:41a-7: nas zhes bya ba la sman pa'i ngag gis so
T16D4421-2:41a-8: 'gyur te / yin no // // gang myos par
T16D4421-2:41a-9: 'gyur ba yin par shes nas ngo tsha ba med
T16D4421-2:41a-11: gang kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa la
T16D4421-2:41a-12: kha na ma tho ba med do snyam pa'i sems
T16D4421-2:41a-13: de nyid nyon mongs pa can no //
T16D4421-2:41a-14: gang myos par mi 'gyur ba'i zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
T16D4421-2:41a-15: gang skyon bsal bar bya ba'i phyir sman pa'i ngag
T16D4421-2:41a-16: gis dug ltar myos par mi 'gyur ba'i drod rig
T16D4421-2:41a-17: nas 'thung ba de ni nyon mongs pa can ma
T16D4421-2:41a-18: yin la / gang dag ji ltar na 'gal bar
T16D4421-2:41a-19: 'gyur snyam ste myos par byas pa'i phyir 'thung ba
T16D4421-2:41a-20: de dag sems de ni nyon mongs pa can yin
T16D4421-2:41a-21: yin la / no // yang khyad par du chang
T16D4421-2:41a-22: 'thung ba nyes par spyod pa nyid du bsgrub pa'i
T16D4421-2:41a-23: phyir du 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams na re /
T16D4421-2:41a-24: myos par 'gyur ba ni rang bzhin gyi kha na ma tho ba yin te zhes smras so //
T16D4421-2:41a-25: gal te myos par 'gyur ba rang bzhin gyi kha na ma tho ba ma yin na ni /
T16D4421-2:41a-27: 'phrod pa'i sh'akya nad pa rnams la gnang bar 'gyur ba zhig na /
T16D4421-2:41a-28: gnang ba yang ma yin te /
T16D4421-2:41a-29: de'i phyir rang bzhin gyi kha na ma tho ba yin te /
T16D4421-2:41a-30: srog chags bsad pa la sogs pa bzhin no //
T16D4421-2:41a-31: gang zhig 'phags pa rnams tshe rabs gzhan du mi
T16D4421-2:41a-32: byed pa'i sdom pa thob pa de ni rang bzhin
T16D4421-2:41a-33: gyi kha na ma tho ba yin te /
T16D4421-2:41a-34: srog gcod pa la sogs pa len par la sogs pa bzhin no //
T16D4421-2:41a-35: lus kyis nyes par spyod pa zhes kyang 'byung ba'i
T16D4421-2:41a-36: phyir rang bzhin gyi kha na ma tho ba yin
T16D4421-2:41a-37: te / de las gzhan pa'i lus kyis nyas par spyad pa bzhin no //
T16D4421-2:41a-38: lus kyis nyes par spyod pa ni rnam pa bzhi gsungs te /
T16D4421-2:41a-40: ma byin par len pa dang /
T16D4421-2:41a-41: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa dang /
T16D4421-2:41b-0: spyir bstan mod @41b kyi zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
T16D4421-2:41b-1: thun mong du bstan mod kyi btsun pa ji ltar bro g-yog bgyi /
T16D4421-2:41b-2: rang bzhin gyi kha na ma tho ba ma gtogs
T16D4421-2:41b-3: pa zhes bya ba 'di ni phyir bstan pa yin
T16D4421-2:41b-4: la / sh'akya nad pa rnams la ni dmigs kyis bsal ba yin te /
T16D4421-2:41b-5: 'dis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' las snga phyi 'gal ba spang pa yin te /
T16D4421-2:41b-6: thal bar 'gyur ba yongs su spang ba'i phyir zhes
T16D4421-2:41b-7: bya ba la chad ni lan cig 'thungs kyang zhen
T16D4421-2:41b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gnas gsum po chang dang /
T16D4421-2:41b-10: mi tshangs par spyod pa dang /
T16D4421-2:41b-11: rmugs pa dang gnyid brten pa ni tshim pa med do zhes gsungs so //
T16D4421-2:41b-12: gang dag phyir bco ba'i phyir myos par mi 'gyur
T16D4421-2:41b-13: ba'i tshang du 'thung ba kha cig yod pa de
T16D4421-2:41b-14: dag la ci'i phyir ma gnang zhe na /
T16D4421-2:41b-15: de'i phyir myos par 'gyur ba'i drod ma nges par zhes bya ba smos so //
T16D4421-2:41b-16: chang de nyid rdzas dang rang bzhin dang lus kyi
T16D4421-2:41b-17: gnas skabs la bltos nas myos par 'gyur ba yang
T16D4421-2:41b-18: yin la myos par mi 'gyur pa yang yin no
T16D4421-2:41b-19: // de nyid kyi phyir rtsva'i rtse mos 'thung ba bkag pa yin no zhes bya ba ni /
T16D4421-2:41b-20: thal bar 'gyur ba spang ba'i phyir rtsva'i rtse mos 'thung ba bkag pa yin te ;
T16D4421-2:41b-21: di lta na ni thal bar 'gyur ba nyid gcod pa yin no //
T16D4421-2:41b-22: 'phags pa rnams mi spyod pa ni ngo tsha dang ldan pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni /
T16D4421-2:41b-23: mdo las slob pa'i stobs lnga 'byung ste /
T16D4421-2:41b-24: dad pa'i stobs dang brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang /
T16D4421-2:41b-25: ngo tsha shes pa'i stobs dang /
T16D4421-2:41b-27: shes rab kyi stobs zhes bya ba yin no //
T16D4421-2:41b-28: de'i phyir ngo tsha dang ldan pa'i phyir mi 'thung bar zad do //
T16D4421-2:41b-29: ngo tsha dang ldan pa dag gis pa tung bar
T16D4421-2:41b-30: bya ba ma yin no zhes bya ba la rgyu
T16D4421-2:41b-32: de'i phyir des kyang dran pa nyams par byed pa'i phyir zhes bya ba smos te /
T16D4421-2:41b-33: chang 'thung ba ni bya ba dang bya ba ma yin pa'i dran pa nyams par 'gyur ro //
T16D4421-2:41b-34: gal te de ltar na ji tsam gyis dran pa
T16D4421-2:41b-35: nyams par mi 'gyur pa cung zad cig ci ste
T16D4421-2:41b-37: de'i phyir cung zad kyang mi gsol te /
T16D4421-2:42a-1: ma nges pa'i phyir zhes bya ba smos te /
T16D4421-2:42a-2: dper na dus dang rang bzhin dang mthu dang ldan
T16D4421-2:42a-3: pas dug chung dus kyang res 'ga' 'chi bar byed
T16D4421-2:42a-4: pa de bzhin du chang yang myos par byed do
T16D4421-2:42a-5: // 'phags pa rnams mi spyod pa'i phyir bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa ste /
T16D4421-2:42a-6: dus ma yin pa'i kha zas bzhin du chang yang ngo zhes slob dpon 'dus bzang zer ro //
T16D4421-2:42a-7: 'di yang myos par 'gyur bar shes nas lhag par mi spyod pa'i phyir ro //
T16D4421-2:42a-8: nyes par spyod pa zhes 'byung ba ni /
T16D4421-2:42a-9: bag med pa'i gnas yin pa'i phyir te /
T16D4421-2:42a-10: rang bzhin gyi kha na ma tho ba yin pa'i phyir ni ma yin no snyam du bsams pa'o //
T16D4421-2:42a-11: de nyid kyi phyir 'di la zhes bya ba ni bslab pa'i gzhi 'di la /
T16D4421-2:42a-12: 'bru'i chang dang sbyar ba'i chang bag med pa'i gnas spangs te zhes smos so //
T16D4421-2:42a-13: gzhan la ma yin te zhes bya ba ni srog gcod pa spong ba la sogs pa dag la'o //
T16D4421-2:42a-14: ma smos pa'i rgyu bshad pa ni de dag ni
T16D4421-2:42a-15: rang bzhin gyi kha na ma tho ba yin pa'i
T16D4421-2:42a-16: phyir ro // ha cang kun tu bsten pas zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni //
T16D4421-2:42a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo las 'bru'i chang dang sbyar
T16D4421-2:42a-18: ba'i chang bag med pa'i gnas kun du bsten cing
T16D4421-2:42a-19: goms par byas lan mang du byas pas lus zhig
T16D4421-2:42a-20: nas dmyal ba dag tu skye'o zhes gsungs so //
T16D4421-2:42a-22: sngon bsags pa ni 'jug pa thob pa'i phyir te /
T16D4421-2:42a-23: 'chi ba'i gnas skabs su 'jug pa thob pa'i phyir ro //
T16D4421-2:42a-24: bag med pa thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pas zhes bya ba ni /
T16D4421-2:42a-25: brjed nges pa'i pag med pa dang /
T16D4421-2:42a-26: srog gcod pa la sogs pa mi dge thams cad
T16D4421-2:42a-27: kyi gnas dang gzhi dang rten ces bya ba'i tha
T16D4421-2:42a-28: tshig go // bya ba la bltos pa med par
T16D4421-2:42a-29: bya ba ma yin pa la gzhol ba nyid ni
T16D4421-2:42a-31: de'i rgyu ni bag med pa'i gnas so //
T16D4421-2:42a-32: chang ni de spang ba'i sdom pa can la sbyin
T16D4421-2:42a-33: par mi bya ste bag med pa'i gnas yin pa'i
T16D4421-2:42a-34: phyir ro // gang las gcig 'thob pa zhes bya ba la /
T16D4421-2:42a-35: dri ba'i don ni las sbyor ba dang dngos dang mjug rnams dang /
T16D4421-2:42b-0: sems can @42b dang sems can ma yin par ston pa'i gzhi dag dang /
T16D4421-2:42b-1: rang bzhin dang bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba dag las zhes bya ba'o //
T16D4421-2:42b-2: sbyor ba dang dngos dang mjug las so zhes bya
T16D4421-2:42b-3: ba ni las kyi lam gyi lam rnams kyi zhes
T16D4421-2:42b-5: mi dge ba'i las kyi lam rnams kyi zhes bya bar sbyar te /
T16D4421-2:42b-6: mi dge ba'i las kyi lam rnams kyi sbyor ba
T16D4421-2:42b-7: dang dngos dang mjug dag las ci rigs par de
T16D4421-2:42b-8: dag gi gnyen por so sor thar pa'i sdom pa'i
T16D4421-2:42b-9: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dag skye'o //
T16D4421-2:42b-10: sems can dang sems can ma yin par ston pa zhes bya ba ni gzhi'o //
T16D4421-2:42b-11: rang bzhin dang bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba
T16D4421-2:42b-12: las so zhes bya ba ni las dag las te
T16D4421-2:42b-13: 'di ni re re dang sbyar bar bya'o //
T16D4421-2:42b-14: sems can dang sems can ma yin par ston pa zhes bya ba la /
T16D4421-2:42b-15: rang bzhin gyi kha na ma tho ba dang bcas
T16D4421-2:42b-16: pa sems can ma yin par ston pa ji lta
T16D4421-2:42b-17: bu zhe na sa le sbram brku ba la sogs
T16D4421-2:42b-18: pa lta bu'o // sems can du ston pa ji lta bu zhe na /
T16D4421-2:42b-19: bud med kyi yul mi tshangs par spyod pa lta bu'o //
T16D4421-2:42b-20: bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba ni khyim du lhan cig nyal ba lta bu'o //
T16D4421-2:42b-21: khyad par rang bzhin gyi kha na ma tho ba sems can rten can gyi srog gcod pa'o //
T16D4421-2:42b-22: bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba sems can ma
T16D4421-2:42b-23: yin pa'i rten can ni rtsva gcod pa la sogs
T16D4421-2:42b-24: pa'o // sems can gyi rten la 'jug pa'i phyir zhes bya ba 'byung ngo //
T16D4421-2:42b-25: gal te 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa las kyang 'thob na ni /
T16D4421-2:42b-26: de ltar na srog gcod pa la sogs pa spong
T16D4421-2:42b-27: pa'i rang bzhin gang zhig sems can du ston pa
T16D4421-2:42b-28: rnams las thob pa de nyid sems can du ston
T16D4421-2:42b-29: pa ma yin pa rnams las kyang 'thob par 'gyur
T16D4421-2:42b-31: gal te yang so sor thar pa'i sdom pa sems
T16D4421-2:42b-32: can du ston pa yang ma yin pa'i rten can
T16D4421-2:42b-34: de ni sems can ltar phung po dang khams dang
T16D4421-2:42b-35: skye mched da ltar ba dag kho na las 'thob
T16D4421-2:42b-36: pas sems can gyi rten can zhes pa rnyed kyi
T16D4421-2:42b-37: / de sems can ma yin pa'i rten can nyid yin pas 'gog pa ni ma yin no //
T16D4421-2:43a-1: na sems can gyi rten can gtso bo yin pa'i phyir dang /
T16D4421-2:43a-2: cig shos ni de'i yan lag tu nye bar blangs
T16D4421-2:43a-3: pa'i phyir sems can gyi rten can zhes bstan to
T16D4421-2:43a-4: // sbyor ba dang mjug las kyang ma yin na zhes bya ba ni /
T16D4421-2:43a-5: mnyam par gzhag pa'i gnas skabs na sdom pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T16D4421-2:43a-6: bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba las lta smos
T16D4421-2:43a-7: kyang ci dgos zhes bya ba ni khas blangs pa
T16D4421-2:43a-8: med ba'i phyir ro snyam du dgongs pa'o //
T16D4421-2:43a-9: dus thams cad ces bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni /
T16D4421-2:43a-10: de dag dang lhan cig 'byung ba'i sems bzhin du 'das pa dang /
T16D4421-2:43a-11: ma 'ongs pa'i sdom pa gnyis kyang 'thob pa'i phyir ro //
T16D4421-2:43a-12: de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni /
T16D4421-2:43a-13: gang gi phyir so sor thar pa'i sdom pa da ltar ba kho na dang /
T16D4421-2:43a-16: rang bzhin gyi kha na ma tho ba ltar bcas
T16D4421-2:43a-17: pa'i kha na ma tho ba dag las kyang 'thob
T16D4421-2:43a-19: zag pa med pa'i sdom pa gnyis ni da ltar
T16D4421-2:43a-20: pa bzhin du 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dag
T16D4421-2:43a-22: bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba rnams las ni dngos gzhi kho na las te /
T16D4421-2:43a-23: sbyor ba dang mjug dag las ma yin no //
T16D4421-2:43a-24: gzhan dag ni sdom pa thob pa'i dus su da
T16D4421-2:43a-25: ltar byung ba'i las kyi lam dag med pas zhes
T16D4421-2:43a-26: mi 'don te / rnam par rtog par byed pa'i
T16D4421-2:43a-27: chos rnams las so sor thar pa'i sdom pa 'thob
T16D4421-2:43a-28: mi 'don te / kyi / bsam gtan dang zag
T16D4421-2:43a-29: pa med pa'i sdom pa dag ma yin pa ni
T16D4421-2:43a-30: mi 'don te / kyi / mu dang po'o //
T16D4421-2:43a-31: gang da ltar byung ba dang sbyor ba dang mjug
T16D4421-2:43a-32: spong ba las bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba
T16D4421-2:43a-34: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i las kyi lam dngos
T16D4421-2:43a-35: gzhi spong ba las bsam gtan dang zag pa med
T16D4421-2:43a-36: pa'i sdom pa kho na 'thob kyi /
T16D4421-2:43a-37: so sor thar pa'i sdom pa ni ma yin no //
T16D4421-2:43a-38: gsum pa ni da ltar ba'i las kyi lam dag spong ba las so //
T16D4421-2:43a-39: bzhi pa ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i nyer bsdogs dang dngos gzhi dag spong ngo //
T16D4421-2:43a-40: 'dir thams cad du las kyi lam gyi gzhi la
T16D4421-2:43a-41: las kyi sgra 'jug pa snga ma'i bzhi pa yang
T16D4421-2:43b-0: @43b dka' ba ma yin snyam du sems se //
T16D4421-2:43b-1: de ltar byas na da ltar byung ba dang 'das
T16D4421-2:43b-2: pa'i las kyi lam dag sdom par mi rung la
T16D4421-2:43b-3: / ma 'ongs pa'i bdag nyid kyi las kyi las
T16D4421-2:43b-4: kyi gzhi la de'i sgra 'jug pa ma yin pas
T16D4421-2:43b-5: / / rnam pa gzhan du ma 'ongs pa kho na sdom pa rung ngo //
T16D4421-2:43b-6: sdom par nus pas ma 'ongs pa 'dod pa'i las kyi lam 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
T16D4421-2:43b-7: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa rnams ma yin zhes
T16D4421-2:43b-8: bya ba ni de las gzhan pa zhes bya ste
T16D4421-2:43b-9: / dge slong gi sdom pa las gzhan pa rnam pa gsum gzung ngo //
T16D4421-2:43b-10: de la rnam pa gsum yang lus kyi sgo nas
T16D4421-2:43b-11: srog gcod pa la sogs pa rnam pa gsum dang
T16D4421-2:43b-12: / ngag gi sgo nas brdzun du smra ba spong
T16D4421-2:43b-13: ba kho na yan lag tu rnam par gzhag go
T16D4421-2:43b-14: / // ma chags pa dang zhe sdang med pa
T16D4421-2:43b-15: dang gti mug med pa ni dge ba'i sems thams
T16D4421-2:43b-16: cad la lhan cig 'byung la sems chung du dang
T16D4421-2:43b-17: / // 'bring dang / chen po dag ni rnam grangs kyis 'byung gi cig car ma yin pas /
T16D4421-2:43b-18: de'i phyir rgyu las kyang zhes bya ba rgyas par smos so //
T16D4421-2:43b-19: sdom pa la gnas pa zhes bya ba ni thams cad la dbang du bya bar rig par bya'o //

T16D4421-2:45a-4: cig car mi 'byung bas ma yin nam /

T16D4421-2:238a-5: de'i phyir mang po zhig bya dgos la zhes rgyas par 'byung ste /
T16D4421-2:238a-6: re zhig sngon dus kyi srid pa nyid kyang 'dod pa'i khams las 'da' bar dka' na /
T16D4421-2:238a-7: srid pa bar mas lta smos kyang ci dgos /
T16D4421-2:238a-8: dgra bcom pa nyid bar du thob par byed ces bya ba la /
T16D4421-2:238a-9: mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa spangs
T16D4421-2:238a-10: pa dang zhes bya ba ni mi dge ba 'dod
T16D4421-2:238a-11: pa na spyod pa rnams dang /

T16D4421-2:238a-13: dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu gnyis sam gsum

T16D4421-2:238a-17: rgyun tu zhugs pa ni dge sbyong gi 'bras bu gsum thob par bya dgos te /
T16D4421-2:238a-18: lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang phyir mi 'ong ba dang dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu'o //
T16D4421-2:238a-19: khams gsum las yang dag par 'da' ba zhes bya ba ni /
T16D4421-2:238a-20: khams gsum las 'dod chags bral ba'o //
T16D4421-2:238a-21: de yang srid pa bar ma la gnas pas mi
T16D4421-2:238a-22: nus so zhes bya ba ni srid pa bar ma'i
T16D4421-2:238a-23: gnas skabs na zhan pa'i phyir dang yun ring du
T16D4421-2:238a-25: dang por bzhi pa spel bar byed //

T16D4421-2:238a-27: ting nge 'dzin de ni thams cad pas las su
T16D4421-2:238a-28: rung ba zhes bya ba ni shin tu sbyangs pa'i
T16D4421-2:238a-29: bde ba thams cad kyi mchog yin pa'i phyir ro
T16D4421-2:238a-30: // 'di ltar mngon du gyur pa las rten gyis

T16D4421-2:238a-32: // 'phel ba'o // de spel ba la goms par byed pa ni /
T16D4421-2:238a-33: ji ltar sngar yongs su 'grib pa yang goms pa'i shugs la spel bar nus pa'o //
T16D4421-2:238a-34: lam sla ba rnams kyi nang na mchog yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la /
T16D4421-2:238a-35: lam sla ba ni bsam gtan bzhi ste /
T16D4421-2:238a-36: lam sla ba de dag gi nang na bsam gtan bzhi pa mchog yin no //
T16D4421-2:238a-37: de'i sa pa'i shin tu sbyangs pa'i bde ba mchog yin pa'i phyir ro //
T16D4421-2:238b-0: rgyun dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni skad cig ma @238b mang po'o //
T16D4421-2:238b-1: bsam gtan gsum pa la 'dod chags dang bral ba bsam gtan spel bar byed pa ma yin nam /
T16D4421-2:238b-2: de ji ltar bsam gtan spel ba bsgom pas mthong
T16D4421-2:238b-3: bas thob pa gong du 'pho bar 'gyur zhe na
T16D4421-2:238b-4: / de ni yongs su nyams pa srid pa ma yin pas 'di la skyon med do //
T16D4421-2:238b-5: gang zhig dad pas mos pa spel ba bsgom pa
T16D4421-2:238b-6: las yongs su nyams pa des 'jigs pa nyid kyis
T16D4421-2:238b-7: mthong bas thob pa so sor rtog ste gzugs kyi
T16D4421-2:238b-8: khams su skyes te bsam gtan spel bar nus so
T16D4421-2:238b-9: // de ltar byas te sha dapte /
T16D4421-2:238b-10: gong du 'pho ba pamba dyam te /
T16D4421-2:238b-11: spel ba 'di yang phung po lnga'i rang bzhin kun
T16D4421-2:238b-12: rdzob shes pa ste spel bar byed pa brgyad dang
T16D4421-2:238b-13: mngon par shes pa bzhi dang rjes su shes pa
T16D4421-2:238b-14: rnams so // gzhan dag na re sdug bsngal dang
T16D4421-2:238b-15: kun 'byung shes pa dag kho na kun rdzob shes
T16D4421-2:238b-16: rnams so // pa ste / de dag de'i yul can yin pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro //

T16D4421-2:238b-18: shes pa mngon du gyur pa'i phyir de dag spel
T16D4421-2:238b-19: ba la dbang ba nyid du mi 'gyur ro //

T16D4421-2:238b-21: gnas gtsang mar skye ba'i phyir du zhes bya ba ni /

T16D4421-2:238b-23: mi skye ba ni thun mong pa ma yin pa mngon par 'dod pa'o //

T16D4421-2:238b-27: chos la bde bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir ro

T16D4421-2:238b-39: de la zag pa dang bcas pa gang yin pa zhes bya ba la /

T16D4421-2:239a-1: rnam pa lnga yin pa'i phyir 'bras bu yang rnam

T16D4421-2:239a-9: kha cig ni ldang bas spel ba dang kha cig ldang ba'i phyir rnam pa gzhan rnams so //

T16D4421-2:239a-15: gnas gtsang ma dang po dang po'i dbang po lhag
T16D4421-2:239a-16: pa yin pa nas lnga pa shes rab kyi bar
T16D4421-2:239a-17: ro // de'i phyir dad pa la sogs pa lnga
T16D4421-2:239a-18: yang chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po dang shin
T16D4421-2:239a-19: tu chen po dang shin tu ches chen po'i rim
T16D4421-2:239a-21: de'i phyir lnga kho na de 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir gnas gtsang ma rnams su 'gyur ro //
T16D4421-2:239a-22: gtsang ma zhes bya ba ni phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyi gnas yin pa'i phyir ro //
T16D4421-2:239a-23: yang ci las gang gis gnas gtsang ma rnams su

T16D4421-2:239a-28: zag pa med pa ni srid pa la rgyab kyis phyogs pa'i phyir ro //

T16D4421-2:240a-42: kyi bye brag gis drug go zhes bya ba ni

T16D4421-2:240b-7: bcu drug go // sa dang 'dod chags dang bral
T16D4421-2:240b-8: ba'i bye brag gis sum cu rtsa drug go zhes
T16D4421-2:240b-9: bcu drug go // bya ba la / ji ltar zhe na /

T16D4421-2:240b-19: dag dang ldan pa nas rnam pa brgyad pa las

T16D4421-2:240b-21: gnyis pa dang yang dgur 'gyur ro //

T16D4421-2:240b-28: 'gro ba'i skabs su bab pa yin te srid pa

T16D4421-2:325a-13: de'i phyir kun rdzob shes pa'i bdag nyid yin no //
T16D4421-2:325a-14: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po yang
T16D4421-2:325a-15: dag par 'grub pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'byung
T16D4421-2:325a-16: ste / de la bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po
T16D4421-2:325a-17: ni sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang bzod pa'i pha
T16D4421-2:325a-19: ye shes kyi tshogs chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T16D4421-2:325a-20: brtson 'grus dang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag ni rnam pa gnyi ga yin te /
T16D4421-2:325a-21: bsam gtan med na shes rab med do zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T16D4421-2:325a-22: brtson 'grus med par sbyin pa mi gtong la /
T16D4421-2:325a-23: tshul khrims yang dag par mi len cing bzod pa mi sgom mo //
T16D4421-2:325a-24: de ltar na brtson 'grus ni bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi cha dang mthun pa yin no //
T16D4421-2:325a-25: de bzhin du brtson 'grus med na shes rab kyang
T16D4421-2:325a-26: med pas ye shes kyi tshogs chen po'i cha dang
T16D4421-2:325a-28: de bzhin du byams pa la sogs pa tshad med
T16D4421-2:325a-29: pa rnam pa bzhi bsgom pa'i phyogs ni bsod nams
T16D4421-2:325a-30: kyi tshogs kyi cha mthun pa'o //
T16D4421-2:325a-31: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sogs pa byang
T16D4421-2:325a-32: chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bsgom
T16D4421-2:325a-33: pa bsgom pa'i phyogs ni ye shes kyi tshogs chen
T16D4421-2:325a-35: 'dis rgya che ba nyid dang che ba nyid ma yin pa ston par byed do //
T16D4421-2:325a-36: rnam pas che ba ni sdug bsngal gsum gyi rnam pa'i phyir te /
T16D4421-2:325a-37: snying rje ni sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa can no //
T16D4421-2:325a-38: dmigs pas che ba ni khams gsum du skye ba'i
T16D4421-2:325a-39: so so skye bo thams cad la dmigs pa'i phyir
T16D4421-2:325b-0: ro // snying rje 'dod @325b pa'i khams su skyes pa kho na la dmigs so //
T16D4421-2:325b-1: mnyam pa nyid kyis che ba nyid ni thugs rje
T16D4421-2:325b-2: chen po ni sems can thams cad la mnyam par
T16D4421-2:325b-4: gang gi phyir 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal sems can rnams la 'jug pa mtshungs par 'jug ste /
T16D4421-2:325b-5: sems can rnams la 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
T16D4421-2:325b-6: snying rje ni sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal gyi sems
T16D4421-2:325b-7: can rnams la 'jug ste mi mnyam par 'jug ste
T16D4421-2:325b-8: / sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal ni mi mnyam pa'i phyir ro //
T16D4421-2:325b-9: ches che ba nyid ni de bas ches che ba
T16D4421-2:325b-10: med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni de la
T16D4421-2:325b-11: shin tu dang rim ches kyis rim pa bzlog pa'o
T16D4421-2:325b-12: // ji ltar snying rjes snying rje bar byed pa
T16D4421-2:325b-13: de ltar nges kyang yin pa de gnyis la khyad
T16D4421-2:325b-14: par ma mthong nas tha dad du bya ba ci
T16D4421-2:325b-15: yod ces bya ba dris so //
T16D4421-2:325b-16: tha dad du bya ba ni dbye bar bya'o //
T16D4421-2:325b-17: zhe sdang med pa dang gti mug med pa'i ngo
T16D4421-2:325b-18: bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni
T16D4421-2:325b-19: / snying rje ni zhe sdang med pa'i ngo bo'o //
T16D4421-2:325b-20: thugs rje chen po ni gti mug med pa'i ngo bo'o //
T16D4421-2:325b-21: sa las ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T16D4421-2:325b-22: snying rje ni bsam gtan bzhi'i sa pa yin no //
T16D4421-2:325b-23: 'dir mi lcogs pa med pa dang bsam gtan khyad
T16D4421-2:325b-24: par can ni bsam gtan dang po'i khongs su gtogs
T16D4421-2:325b-25: pas logs shig tu ma bshad do //
T16D4421-2:325b-26: thugs rje chen po ni bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa pa'o //
T16D4421-2:325b-27: nyan thos la sogs pa zhes bya ba la /
T16D4421-2:325b-28: sogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni 'jig rten pa dang rang sangs rgyas bsdu'o //
T16D4421-2:325b-29: thugs rje chen po ni srid pa'i rtse mo la 'dod chags dang bral bas 'thob ste /
T16D4421-2:325b-30: zad pa shes pa dang stobs la sogs pa bzhi dang ma chags pa la sogs pa bzhin no //
T16D4421-2:325b-31: yongs su mi skyob pa dang skyob pa dang zhes
T16D4421-2:325b-32: bya ba ni snying rjes ni nyan thos la sogs
T16D4421-2:325b-33: pa dag sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams la nyam
T16D4421-2:325b-34: nga ba 'ba' zhig tu zad kyi de dag gis
T16D4421-2:325b-35: sdug bsngal ba las bskyab par mi nus so //
T16D4421-2:325b-36: bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sdug bsngal de las yongs su bskyab par mdzad pa'o //
T16D4421-2:325b-37: mi 'dra ba dang 'dra bar thugs rje mdzad pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni /
T16D4421-2:326a-0: snying rjes ni sdug bsngal can rnams kho na la thugs rje @326a * //
T16D4421-2:326a-2: thugs rje chen pos ni sems can thams cad la ste /
T16D4421-2:326a-3: ji ltar snying rjes sdug bsngal ba rnams la thugs
T16D4421-2:326a-4: rjes mdzad pa de ltar thugs rje chen pos sems
T16D4421-2:326a-5: can thams cad skyob par mdzad do //
T16D4421-2:326a-6: mnar med par skyob pa rnams la ji lta ba
T16D4421-2:326a-7: de ltar srid pa'i rtse mor skyes pa rnams la
T16D4421-2:326a-8: yang ngo // ke tsittva n+ya na tsa /
T16D4421-2:326a-9: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bshad de /
T16D4421-2:326a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa mi mnga' ba
T16D4421-2:326a-11: dang ca co mi mnga' ba dang thugs mnyam par
T16D4421-2:326a-12: ma bzhag pa mi mnga' ba dang dran pa nyams
T16D4421-2:326a-13: pa mi mnga' ba dang so sor ma brtags pa'i
T16D4421-2:326a-14: btang snyoms (stag lung ke tsi rbantya ne pa/) mi
T16D4421-2:326a-15: mnga' ba dang 'dun pa nyams pa mi mnga' ba
T16D4421-2:326a-16: dang brtson 'grus nyams pa mi mnga' ba dang /
T16D4421-2:326a-17: tha dad pa nyid kyi 'du shes mi mnga' ba
T16D4421-2:326a-18: dang 'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i
T16D4421-2:326a-19: ye shes gzigs pa 'jug pa dang /
T16D4421-2:326a-20: de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung
T16D4421-2:326a-21: ba'i dus la zhes bya ba de lta bu la
T16D4421-2:326a-22: sogs pa'o // sngon gyi bsod nams dang ye shes
T16D4421-2:326a-23: kyi tshogs kyis yang dag par 'grub pa ni sangs
T16D4421-2:326a-24: rgyas pa nyid kyi sngon rol gyi bsod nams kyi
T16D4421-2:326a-25: tshogs dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyis yang dag par
T16D4421-2:326a-26: sogs pa'o // 'grub pa'o // de la bsod nams dang ye shes dag tshogs pas na tshogs so //
T16D4421-2:326a-27: yang na 'dis sangs rgyas nyid kyi rgyu dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad tshogs pas na tshogs so //
T16D4421-2:326a-28: sogs pa zhes bya ba 'di yang dag par sdud ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T16D4421-2:326a-29: chos kyi sku yongs su grub pa zhes bya ba
T16D4421-2:326a-30: ni chos kyi sku ni zag pa med pa'i chos
T16D4421-2:326a-31: kyi rgyun nam gnas yongs su gyur pa yin no
T16D4421-2:326a-32: // 'jig rten gyi don spyod pa las bya ba
T16D4421-2:326a-33: ni 'jig rten gyi don ni mtho ris dang byang
T16D4421-2:326a-34: // grol gyi rgyu'o // de bsgrub pa ni don spyod pa ste /
T16D4421-2:326a-35: sangs rgyas rnams kyis gzhan gyi don mdzad pa'i thugs rje chen po dang mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
T16D4421-2:326a-36: 'di yang rgyu dang 'bras bu dang gzhan gyi don
T16D4421-2:326a-37: gyi bya ba'i sgo nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis
T16D4421-2:326a-39: dus ji lta ba bzhin du zhes bya ba ni thams cad dang sbyar ro //
T16D4421-2:326a-40: ji ltar zhe na yul shin tu ring ba dang /
T16D4421-2:326b-0: @326b thung ngur 'tsho ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni
T16D4421-2:326b-1: 'di ltar skye dgu'i tshe lo brgyad khri ba yin
T16D4421-2:326b-2: pas na sku tshe lo brgyad khri yin la skye
T16D4421-2:326b-3: dgu'i tshe lo brgya pa yin pas na sku tshe
T16D4421-2:326b-5: dus ji lta ba bzhin rgyal rigs dang bram ze'i
T16D4421-2:326b-6: rigs tha dad pa ni gang gi tshe 'jig rten
T16D4421-2:326b-7: gyis rgyal rigs bkur ba de'i tshe rgyal rigs su
T16D4421-2:326b-8: 'byung la / gang gi tshe bram ze bkur ba de'i tshe ni bram zer ro //
T16D4421-2:326b-9: dus ji lta ba bzhin du 'od srungs dang sh'akya
T16D4421-2:326b-10: la sogs pa gdung tha dad pa ni gang gi
T16D4421-2:326b-11: tshe 'jig rten na rus gang che ba mchod par
T16D4421-2:326b-12: 'os par 'gyur ba de'i tshe de'i gdung du 'byung
T16D4421-2:326b-13: ba'o // dus ji lta ba bzhin du sku bong
T16D4421-2:326b-14: tshod chung ba dang chung ba ma yin pa tha
T16D4421-2:326b-15: dad pa ni gang gi tshe 'jig rten na bong
T16D4421-2:326b-16: tshod chung ngu yin pa de'i tshe sku bong tshod
T16D4421-2:326b-17: chung la gang gi tshe bong tshod chung ba ma
T16D4421-2:326b-18: yin pa de'i tshe sku bong chung ba ma yin
T16D4421-2:326b-19: ba'o // pa'o // rnam pa gsum po 'di kho
T16D4421-2:326b-20: na zhes bya ba ni gang zhig tha ma thag
T16D4421-2:326b-21: tu sangs rgyas rnams mnyam pa nyid kyi rgyur bshad
T16D4421-2:326b-22: pa rgyu phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T16D4421-2:326b-23: 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T16D4421-2:326b-24: phan 'dogs pa phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T16D4421-2:326b-25: sngon gyi bsod nams dang ye shes kyis yang dag
T16D4421-2:326b-26: par 'grub pas na rgyu phun sum tshogs pa bstan
T16D4421-2:326b-27: la chos kyi sku yongs su 'grub pas ni 'bras
T16D4421-2:326b-29: don spyod pas ni phan 'dogs pa phun tshogs pa'o //
T16D4421-2:326b-30: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad la goms pa zhes bya ba la /
T16D4421-2:326b-31: bsod nams zhes smos pa ni ci rigs par sbyin
T16D4421-2:326b-32: pa la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa lnga
T16D4421-2:326b-33: dang dad pa la sogs pa rnams bsdus so //
T16D4421-2:326b-34: ye shes smos pas ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kho na'o //
T16D4421-2:326b-35: yun ring po nas goms pa zhes bya ba ni bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du goms pa'o //
T16D4421-2:326b-36: yun ring por goms kyang bar dang bcas pa yod
T16D4421-2:326b-37: pas de'i phyir bar chad med pa zhes bya ba
T16D4421-2:326b-38: smos te / bar chad med par bya dka' bas so //
T16D4421-2:326b-39: res 'ga' gus par ma byas par yang yin pas
T16D4421-2:326b-40: de'i phyir gus par byas te goms pa zhes bya
T16D4421-2:326b-41: ba smos so // ngan song gsum dang 'khor ba'i
T16D4421-2:326b-42: sdug bsngal las gtan du thar bar mdzad pa phun
T16D4421-2:327a-1: pa'o zhes bya ba ni ngan song gsum las thar
T16D4421-2:327a-2: bar mdzad pa phan 'dogs pa rnam pa gsum dang
T16D4421-2:327a-3: 'khor ba las thar bar mdzad pa ste /
T16D4421-2:327a-4: de ltar rnam pa bzhir 'gyur ro //
T16D4421-2:327a-5: yang na theg pa gsum dang bde 'gro la bgrod
T16D4421-2:327a-6: par mdzad pa phun sum tshogs pa'o zhes bya ba
T16D4421-2:327a-7: ni theg pa gsum po rje re la bkod pa
T16D4421-2:327a-8: phun sum tshogs pa gsum dang bde 'gro la bkod
T16D4421-2:327a-9: pa ste rnam pa bzhir 'gyur ro //
T16D4421-2:327a-10: ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam pa bzhi
T16D4421-2:327a-11: ste zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu phun sum tshogs
T16D4421-2:327a-12: pa rnam pa bzhi po gang yin pa de re
T16D4421-2:327a-13: re yang de ltar rnam ba bzhir 'byed pa'o //
T16D4421-2:327a-14: ma bstan par mkhyen pa zhes bya ba ni bdag
T16D4421-2:327a-15: nyid kyis mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don
T16D4421-2:327a-16: gyis so // thams cad mkhyen pa ni mtshan nyid
T16D4421-2:327a-17: ma lus par thugs su chud pa'i don gyis so
T16D4421-2:327a-18: gyis so // // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
T16D4421-2:327a-19: ni rnam pa thams cad du thugs su chud pa'i
T16D4421-2:327a-20: gyis so // // don gyis so // ma 'bad
T16D4421-2:327a-21: par mkhyen pa ni bzhed pa tsam gyis thugs su
T16D4421-2:327a-23: nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba zhes bya ba
T16D4421-2:327a-24: ni mthong ba dang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i
T16D4421-2:327a-25: nyon mongs pa khams gsum pa spang ba'i phyir ro
T16D4421-2:327a-26: // gtan du spang ba ni yongs su mi mnyam pa'i sgo nas so //
T16D4421-2:327a-27: bag chags dang bcas te spang pa ni rjes su 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T16D4421-2:327a-28: ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgrib ba
T16D4421-2:327a-29: spang ba'o zhes bya ni gnyi ga'i cha las rnam
T16D4421-2:327a-31: spyi'i yul sprul pa dang yongs su bsgyur ba dang
T16D4421-2:327a-32: byin gyis rlob pa'i mnga' ba phun sum tshogs pa
T16D4421-2:327a-33: zhes bya ba de la sprul pa ni phyi'i yul
T16D4421-2:327a-35: yongs su bsgyur ba ni rdo la sogs pa gser la sogs pa'i dngos por mdzad pa'o //
T16D4421-2:327a-36: byin gyis rlob pa ni yun ring du gnas par mdzad pa'o //
T16D4421-2:327a-37: de dag la mnga' ba nyid ni bzhed pa'i sgo nas 'jug pa'o //
T16D4421-2:327a-38: mnga' ba nyid phun sum tshogs pa ni mnga' ba phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T16D4421-2:327a-39: sku tshe gtong ba dang byin gyis rlob pa'i mnga'
T16D4421-2:327a-40: de nyid phun sum tshogs pa ni sku tshe gtong
T16D4421-2:327a-41: ba dang byin gyis rlob pa'i mnga' phun sum tshogs
T16D4421-2:327b-0: pa'o // bsgrib @327b pa la gshegs pa dang /
T16D4421-2:327b-1: shin tu ring ba la myur du gshegs pa dang /
T16D4421-2:327b-2: nam mkha' la gshegs pa dang /
T16D4421-2:327b-3: rdul phra rab chung du mang po ste 'jig rten
T16D4421-2:327b-4: gyi khams 'jug par mdzad pa ni bsgribs pa dang
T16D4421-2:327b-5: / nam mkha' dang shin tu ring ba la myur du gshegs pa dang /
T16D4421-2:327b-6: chung ngur mang po 'jug par mdzad pa'o //
T16D4421-2:327b-7: de dag la mnga' ba ni bzhed dgur mdzad pa ste de nyid phun sum tshogs pa yin no //
T16D4421-2:327b-8: ya mtshan gyi chos rnal ma rnam pa sna tshogs
T16D4421-2:327b-9: phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba ni rnal ma
T16D4421-2:327b-10: rang bzhin gyis 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i don du
T16D4421-2:327b-11: ste / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gshegs pa na mtho dman mnyam par 'gyur te /
T16D4421-2:327b-12: mtho ba gang yin pa de ni dma' bar 'gyur la /
T16D4421-2:327b-13: dma' ba gang yin pa de ni mthon por 'gyur ro //
T16D4421-2:327b-14: long ba rnams kyis ni mig 'thob po //
T16D4421-2:327b-15: 'on pa rnams kyis ni rna ba 'thob po //
T16D4421-2:327b-16: smyon pa rnams kyis ni dran pa 'thob po zhes
T16D4421-2:327b-17: bya ba gang yin pa 'di ni chos nyid yin
T16D4421-2:327b-18: te / thams cad rgyas par mdo las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin khong du chud par bya'o //
T16D4421-2:327b-19: mtshan phun sum tshogs pa ni zhes bya ba ni /
T16D4421-2:327b-20: gsal la rdzogs pa dang yul la gnas pa'i phyir
T16D4421-2:327b-21: skyes bu chen po'i ngo bo nye bar mtshon pas
T16D4421-2:327b-22: mtshan dag ste / de dag ni gtsug tor la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gnyis so //
T16D4421-2:327b-23: dpe byad bzang po phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba ni /
T16D4421-2:327b-24: skyes bu chen po'i ngo bo bsal bar byed pa'i phyir dpe byad bzang po dag ste /
T16D4421-2:327b-25: de dag ni sen mo zangs kyi mdog lta bu
T16D4421-2:327b-26: la sogs pa brgyad cu ste de dag kyang mtshan
T16D4421-2:327b-27: bzhin du phun sum tshogs par rig par bya'o //
T16D4421-2:327b-28: stobs phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba ni sred med kyi bu'i stobs dang ldan pas so //
T16D4421-2:327b-29: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung rdo rje lta bur sra ba ni mi phyed pa'i phyir ro //
T16D4421-2:327b-30: de ltar na de dag ni mdor bsdus pa yin no zhes bya ba ni /
T16D4421-2:327b-31: mdor bsdu na rgyu dang 'bras bu dang phan 'dogs
T16D4421-2:327b-32: pa rnams kyis yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams
T16D4421-2:327b-34: gal te sku tshe bskal pa grangs med du mar zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
T16D4421-2:328a-0: gal te sangs rgyas bcom ldan @328a * //
T16D4421-2:328a-1: 'das kyis bskal pa grangs med pa gnyis sam gsum du sku tshe byin gyis rlob par mdzad na /
T16D4421-2:328a-2: de ltar sangs rgyas gyi che ba'i bdag nyid gsungs
T16D4421-2:328a-3: pa dang mkhyen par spyod do zhes bstan par 'gyur
T16D4421-2:328a-4: ro // re zhig de ltar na zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
T16D4421-2:328a-5: yon tan rnams dang ye shes rnams dang mthu dang
T16D4421-2:328a-6: phan 'dogs pa dang thugs rje chen po ni yon
T16D4421-2:328a-7: tan dang ye shes dang phan 'dogs pa dang thugs
T16D4421-2:328a-9: mtha' yas shing rmad du byung ba ni de nyid
T16D4421-2:328a-10: kyi yon tan dang ye shes la sogs pa ste
T16D4421-2:328a-11: / mtha' yas pa ni grangs dang mthu mthas gtugs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T16D4421-2:328a-12: rmad du byung ba ni sangs rgyas rnams las gzhan
T16D4421-2:328a-13: med pa'i phyir dang mdzad par dka' ba'i phyir dang
T16D4421-2:328a-14: brnyes par dka' ba'i phyir ro //
T16D4421-2:328a-15: de nyid rin po che chen po yin te /
T16D4421-2:328a-16: sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs pa'i phyir te
